resources.string: Available only in the Donate version
Enable or disable whole Sanity sytem. If disabled, this application won\'t affect phone calls.
Disable automatic handling of devices and handsfree when headsets (wired or wireless) are connected.
Force bluetooth audio device to be correctly handled by Sanity.
Check this option only if Sanity enable/disable handsfree or devices in a wrong way when the phone is far/close to your ear.
Set default values for all application preferences.
Tap here to backup/restore all current preferences to/from memory card.
Manage settings profiles to quickly change more preferences in one fell swoop.
Which devices should be disabled for reducing electromagnetic waves during a call.
Disable GPS during a call (it will be restored at call end). It works with many phone models, but not with all.
Disable Mobile Data (2G/3G) during a call (it will be restored at call end). It works with many phone models, but not with all.
Skip automatic Mobile Data (2G/3G) disabling during a call when GPS is enabled.
Disable Wifi during a call (it will be restored at call end).
Disable Bluetooth during a call (it will be restored at call end).
Skip automatic Bluetooth disabling during a call if there are Bluetooth devices connected to phone.
Skip automatic Mobile Data (2G/3G) and Wifi disabling during a call if phone is configured like Router Wifi.
Skip automatic Mobile Data disabling during a call if Tethering USB is enabled.
Options for enabling and disabling devices during a call by checking proximity sensor.
Turn OFF devices only when the phone is close to your ear. (If disabled, turn off when call start.)
Delay time for turning OFF devices when your ear is close to phone.
Turn ON devices (turned off by Sanity) during a call when the phone is NOT close to your ear.
Delay time for turning ON devices when the phone is NOT close to your ear.
Force to turn OFF the screen during call when the phone is close to your ear.
Force to turn ON the screen during call when the phone is far from your ear.
Automatically enable/disable handsfree when the phone is far/close to your ear.
Delay time for automatically turning ON handsfree when the phone is NOT close to your ear.
Set maximum volume when Sanity automatically enables handsfree.
Delay time for automatically turning ON handsfree when call begins.
Turn off handsfree on call end, just before the call end sound is played.
How many times up to automatically enable handsfree during one call when the phone is far from ear.
How many times up to automatically disable handsfree during one call when the phone is close to ear.
Options for automatic volume setting during a call.
Volume to automatically set during a call while no headsets are used.
Volume to automatically set during a call while using wired headsets.
Volume to automatically set during a call while using wireless headsets.
Play only the audio of the conversation, muting any other audio stream during phone calls.
Options for recording call audio on memory card.
This free version is limited to 2 minutes for each recording.
Attention please: in some countries call recording is forbidden by government laws. The author disagrees every illegal use of Sanity. Be aware, use it at your risk!
Put recording notification on statusbar during phone call: tap that notification to start/stop call recording.
Select the source device used for recording audio. Attention: many phones are limited to "Microphone" as only working one!
Select file format used to save audio file recordings.
Show list of audio files recorded by Sanity (stored in \"Sanity\" folder inside memory card).
Allow system multimedia scanner to track audio files recorded by Sanity.
Choose to start or stop recording using camera button during phone call.
Android recording system is very limited: actually you can record calls only when HANDSFREE IS TURNED ON!
Enable automatic START recording. If disabled, Sanity won\'t start recording automatically.
Delay time for starting audio recording automatically.
Automatic start audio recording when handsfree is turned on by Sanity.
Headset rules about automatic start audio recording.
Choose call directions for starting audio recording.
Maximum times to start automatic recording during a single call.
Enable automatic STOP recording. If disabled, you\'ll have to stop manually.
Delay for stopping audio recording automatically.
Automatic stop audio recording when handsfree is turned off by Sanity.
Headset rules about automatic stop audio recording.
Choose the maximum duration of one audio recording. Sanity will stop the recording after this time.
Choose when Sanity should show notifications.
Notify when devices are automatically turned off by Sanity.
Notify when devices are automatically restored by Sanity.
Notify if Sanity is running when a phone call starts.
Notify when volume is automatically changed by Sanity.
Notify when audio recording is stopped by Sanity.
Information about this application and tools for contacting the developer.
Show recent changes about last Sanity versions.
Tap here to show instructions for uninstalling Sanity (useful only on Android Froyo 2.2 or greater).
Tap here to write an email to the developer. You can use email also for bug reports and feature requests.
You are invited to leave a comment about Sanity on Market. Tap here to open Market. Please don\'t report bugs in Market comments.
Tap here to open the official web site of the GNU General Public License version 3.
For supporting Sanity, you can donate the money amount you prefer using PayPal. Tap here to open PayPal site.
Sanity is free. If you like this application, support the development with a donation.
You have supported Sanity. Thank you for your donation!
This is the full version of Sanity.
Use administrator privileges for turning off screen when you put the phone close to your ear during a call.
Preferences backup file exists in memory card. Would you like to restore all preferences now?
If you activate the profile, you\'ll lose all current preferences.To avoid this, add a new profile before activating.\nAre you sure to activate the profile?
The current preferences are already saved in the active profile.\n\nWould you really create a new profile?
Would you SAVE all current preferences to the profile \"%s\"? All profile preferences will be overwritten.
Would you really DELETE the profile \"%s\"?
Are you sure to DELETE the selected file?
Are you sure to DELETE all %s selected files?
Sanity error: unable to create directory on sdcard for saving audio recording!
Sanity error: unable to start audio recording!
Tap here to START call recording
Tap here to STOP call recording
Sanity: 2 minutes limit reached, recording is stopped.
Error while changing scanner properties: permission denied on file \"%s\"
There are no audio files of call records. Start a call record to see its audio file here.
Sanity: action canceled, the recording system is not running.
Choose what to do with this audio file.
This option requires at least Android version 2.2 (Froyo). Sorry, your phone has Android 2.1 (Eclair).
Choose to backup or restore all current preferences to memory card.
No backup file exists on memory card! You have to make a backup before trying to restore.
No profile exists. Use menu to create new one.
Choose the name of the new profile to create
Change the name of the profile
Unable to open Market! Check Market application is rightly installed.
